name: Chrono (itch) (meerian)
description:
(Note: First load might take awhile!)

A short casual shooter based on the game jam theme of "Death is useful".

Gameplay:
You play as a wizard with the ability to turn back time. On death, you are able to rewind time, get stronger and try again. Try to set a new high score by beating the 5 waves as fast as possible!
